topic.title: Zamboni's Curse
topic.body: IF u R READING THIS IT IS ALREADY TOO LATE YOU HAVE BEEN STRUCK BY THE CURSE OF THE GREAT ZAMBONI. TO UNDO THE CURSE YOU MUST STRIP DOWN AND RUB YOUR FORESKIN ON ICE11!! IF U DO NOT DO SO U WILL BE KILLED BY THE GREAT ZAMBONI WHEN U LEAST EXPECT IT!!!11!!

2_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj.body: WE R ANTIFA. IF U DO NOT STOP POSTING ON THIS EVEIL NAZI NETWORK THEN WE WILL BE FORCED TO WAGE WAR ON U. #resistCapitalism #peaceThroughViolence #fuckWhitey
